text: Hi Guys, just wondering if you know how does the Google Analytics integration added in the header section of a HubSpot pages? Iâ€™ve tried disabling the Integrate with GA from Settings > Website > Pages > tracking integration but still the GA integration script was still there. I hope someone can help me find or to where it is encoded in the HubSpot webpages. :disappointed:

I dont think the GA integration was added or injected by the analytics.js. Based from what i understand the analytics.js file was added by the GA integration snippet (please correct me if i am wrong).
ah...i got it, the GA integration is injected by Integrate with GA from Settings > Website > Pages > tracking integration. I guess there is no way to update/edit the script from the developers end.
